cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4.1)

set (CMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE ON)
set (CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 11)

add_library(cpp-code
            SHARED
            ../cpp-code/src/src/example.cpp
            ../cpp-code/src/src/affine.cpp
            ../cpp-code/src/src/compare.cpp
            ../cpp-code/src/src/element.cpp
            ../cpp-code/src/src/fingerprint.cpp
            cpp-adapter.cpp
)

target_link_libraries(cpp-code
        android
        log)


# Specifies a path to native header files.
include_directories(
            ../cpp-code/src/include
            ../cpp-code/src/incl
)
